errors.ErrorMessage: The office does not appear to be an MCFD office.
There are multiple key players in "Input Involvements". You can only have one key player.
errors.ICMErrorSolution: Please review if any contact is active in another similar Case

errors.ErrorMessage: You can only change the key player "Start Date" by re-opening the file.
You cannot close a file that is in transit.
errors.ICMErrorSolution: The close transaction cannot be used when a file is in the process of a transfer. Ensure the Service Office and the Owner Office are at the same office before closing.

errors.ErrorMessage: The person is an applicant in an open file of the same type.
errors.ICMErrorSolution: Please review if any contact is active in another similar Case.

errors.ErrorMessage: The file already has one spouse. You cannot add another.
errors.ICMErrorSolution: Cannot add 2 spouses on a File. Type the correct relationship in the "Relationship" field. If you want to add a second spouse end date the first spouse before adding the new one.

errors.ErrorMessage: The entered "Office Code" is not in the database. Please review.
errors.ICMErrorSolution: Office Code inputted is not on the database. Please review and input a valid Office Code.

errors.ErrorMessage: The entered "Office Code" does not appear to be a valid MSD office. Please check the office code responsible for the case.
errors.ICMErrorSolution: The case type indicates MSD but the first character of the office code is not numeric. Check the office responsible for the case and select a MSD office code.

errors.ErrorMessage: The dependent’s "Start Date" cannot be before the file’s "Re-Open Date".
A CS (Child Services) file already exists for this key player.
errors.ICMErrorSolution: CS File already exists for this contact.

errors.ErrorMessage: Client is not eligible for assistance due to sanctions. The "Cheque Production" indicator must be off.
The "Cheque Production" indicator cannot be 'On' if "Office" is not a financial office.
For Class 05 (Adult Care), the category must be 21, 22, or 23.
Categories 21, 22, or 23 must be Class 05 (Adult Care).
Class 04 (Transitional Health Svs) requires a "Class Start Date".
The "Annual Review Date" must be within one year.
The "Annual Review Date" field is blank or invalid. Please review.
errors.Fix: enter date of Annual Review a year or less in the future from date of file being opened

errors.ErrorMessage: The "Cheque Production?" indicator cannot be selected because Hardship cannot be extended.
The Hardship/Transition "Start Date" cannot be changed to a later date.
The file cannot be "Class 01 - No Employment Indicated" without PPMB approval, PWD, or status O.
The Hardship/Transition "Start Date" cannot be in the future.
The "Start Date" field is required for the "Hardship/Transition Code".
The "Hardship/Transition Code" field  is required if a "Start Date" is given.
Hardship code" 'G' (Income in Excess) can only be used if there are dependent children involved.
Hardship code N' (Assets in Excess) can only be used for families with children or unemployable.
The HE "Override Month" must be for the previous, current, or next benefit month.
The HE "Override Month" is only valid for 'HE Hardship' files.
errors.Fix: Under the Other Info column, remove the date from the Hardship Override Month field.

errors.ErrorMessage: The file must be 'HE Limited' for the entered "Override Month".
Hardship code W' (Outstanding Warrant) can only be used for singles or couples.
Hardship code W' (Outstanding Warrant) does not apply. Check the warrants and family composition.
Hardship code W' (Outstanding Warrant) cannot be used for adult care or MSO (Medical Services Only).
The "Income Amount" is invalid. It must be between $1.00 and $99999.99.
The "Unearned Income" codes have gone over the maximum limit of 6.
The "Tax Benefit Income" codes have gone over the maximum limit of 3. FB- (Family Bonus) and BCEIB (BC Earned Income Benefit) excluded.
Cannot use 'Override M' if the "Reported by Data Match" amount is zero.
errors.Explanation: M is a monthly override that can be set by the Supervisor or an IO to allow an ongoing change to the CPP information reported by SC.

errors.ErrorMessage: The PWD "Next Action Date" must be more than 210 days in the future.
The PWD "Next Action Date" must be in the future.
errors.Explanation: If there is payment information reported in the next data match with SC, the override is kept by the system.

errors.ErrorMessage: Exclusion Reason" '06-SR CIHR PRECLUDES' is only valid for a sole recipient.
Exclusion Reason" '11-SPOUSE WITH MED CONDITION' is only valid for a couple or two-parent family.
errors.Explanation: If there is no payment information reported in the next data match with SC, the override is removed by the system.

errors.ErrorMessage: Exclusion Reason" '06-SR CIHR PRECLUDES' is for a single recipient with CIHR (Child in the Home of a Relative – grandfathered scheme), please verify CIHR count.
The "End Month" must be a current or future date.
errors.Fix: Update the employment exclusion code/reason to a date that is in the future no greater than 1 year.
errors.Explanation: The Supervisor or an IO can remove this override.

errors.ErrorMessage: The "End Month" field is required if  "Exclusion reason" is entered.
The "Exclusion Reason" field is required if "End Month" is entered
Exclusion End Date" cannot be more than one year in the future.
errors.Fix: Time Limits Manual exclusion Reason end date can not be more than a year in the future, reduce end date to a year or less into the future

errors.ErrorMessage: Person is over 65, with 10 years or more in Canada."Person Status" must be 'R- >65, > 10 YRS RES' or 'O- OAS/GIS, SPOUSE ALLOWANECE'.
The "PWD Adjudication Date" field is blank, please review.
The "PWD Next Action Date" field is blank, please review.
errors.Fix: Field to be updated by a HAB profile.

errors.ErrorMessage: The Bus pass "Expiry Date" must be after "Effective Date".
The bus pass "Effective Date" and "Expiry Date"  fields are required.
Exclusion Reason" '04-SR CHILD MED PRECLUDES' is only valid for a single parent.
errors.Explanation: This rule is the same as the one in MIS the user cannot add in temporarily excused for more than a year into the future, if you have medical information greater than a year in the future this can be documented under medical /behavioral sub view

errors.ErrorMessage: Sponsorship Expiry Date" is not permitted with this immigration code.
errors.ICMErrorSolution: Please review the Immigration Code as a Sponsorship expiry date is not allowed with this code

errors.ErrorMessage: The "Class Code" field is blank, please review.
errors.ICMErrorSolution: The "Class" field is blank. Please navigate to the Case-More Info-More Info IA and update the same.

errors.ErrorMessage: Postal Code" is blank or invalid, please review.
errors.ICMErrorSolution: Please review Address and update if necessary
errors.Explanation: PWD,  and MNS fields on SD More Info can only be updated by someone from HAB

errors.ErrorMessage: There is a "Shelter Types" conflict.
errors.ICMErrorSolution: Please review expenses and/or Case Class Code.
errors.Fix: Ensure no shelter expenses entered for other contacts on case, end date or update to zero any that exist. Also ensure category matches expense type

errors.ErrorMessage: The entered "Area Code" is invalid. It must be numbers and greater than, or equal to, [number].
The Address "Province" field is blank.
errors.ICMErrorSolution: Case Address is invalid. Please review Case Address.

errors.ErrorMessage: There is a "Shelter Types" conflict.
errors.ICMErrorSolution: Please review expenses and/or Case Class Code.

errors.ErrorMessage: The "Application Sent" indicator is required.
errors.ICMErrorSolution: Please contact Provincial services for CPP Application Sent indicator Review/update

errors.ErrorMessage: The "Application Sent" date cannot be in the future.
The "Application Sent" indicator must be set to 'No' if an "Application Not Sent" reason code is entered.
errors.Explanation: if expenses are accidentally added on dependents rather than Key player they must have an end date entered. Also if you enter in conflicting information such as a utility amount with a room and Board expense,  shelter types will be in conflict

errors.ErrorMessage: The "Application Sent" indicator is required if the "Success Indicator" is entered.
errors.Fix: cannot have success indicator if no application sent, if already eligible

errors.ErrorMessage: The "Success Date" cannot be in the future.
You cannot fill the "Success Reason" field without selecting the "Application Success" indicator.
The "Application Success" field must be 'No' if the "Appealed" indicator is selected, as an application cannot be both successful and appealed.
You cannot fill the "Appealed Reason" field withouth selecting the "Appealed" indicator.
The "CPP Appeal Success Date" cannot be in the future.
The "Monthly Benefit Amount" field is required if a "Monthly Benefit Date" is selected.
The entered date format is invalid. It must be YYYY-MMM.
Start Month", "End Month" and "Next Cheque Issue Date" must all be in the future.
errors.Fix: Ensure fields for Start Month, End Month and Next Cheque Issue date are all in the future

errors.ErrorMessage: The "Start Date" cannot be later than the next benefit month.
The "Start Date" must be within the current benefit month for sanction code 20.
The entered "End Date" does not match the sanction frequency.
The "End Date" field is blank, please review.
A duplicate with the same name, gender, and birth date exists.
A duplicate with the same name, gender, and birth date exists, but has a non-matching SIN.
errors.Explanation: The user will receive an integration error if a date is entered into signal which is not in the future, generally a message will display when this information is entered incorrectly and should be adjusted before leaving signal view

errors.ErrorMessage: The "Gender" field is blank, please review.
A duplicate with the same name, gender, and birth date exists (no SIN).
The "Date of Birth" field is blank, please review.
The "Sponsorship Expiry Date" must be later than the "Moved to Canada Date".
The "Sponsorship Expiry Date" field is blank, please review.
The "Immigration Type" field is blank, please review.
The "Moved to Canada Date" field is required if an "Immigration Type" is selected.
The IRCC/HR2786 "Requested Date" is invalid. It must be in the past.
The IRCC/HR2786 "Received Date" cannot be before the IRCC/HR2786 "Requested Date".
The "Canadian by Birth?" field must be either 'Yes' or 'No'.
The "Immigration Type" field must be set to 'ACC CANADIAN CITZ' if the "Canadian Citizen?" field is set to 'Yes'.
The "Immigration Entry Type" field is blank, please review.
IMM1000/5292 Number format error: "T" must be followed by 9 digits.
IMM1000/5292 Number format error: "J" must be followed by 9 digits.
IMM1000/5292 Number format error: "H" must be followed by 7 digits.
IMM1000/5292 Number format error: "G" must be followed by 7 digits.
IMM1000/5292 Number format error: "W" must be followed by 9 digits.
IMM1000/5292 Number format error: it must begin with G, H, J, T or W.
The "Sponsorship Expiry Date" cannot be more than 30 years after the "Moved to Canada Date".
The "Sponsorship Start Date" must be earlier than the "Sponsorship Expiry Date".
The IRCC/CPC file number format is invalid.
If the "Canadian by Birth" field is set to 'Yes', then all other fields must be blank.
There is a "Sponsorship Start Date" and "Expiry Date" conflict.
The "Canadian Citizen?" field must be 'Yes' or 'No'.
The IRCC/CPC "File Number" must have an "IRCC/HR2786 Received Date.
The entered "Client ID Number" is invalid. It must be 8 digits.
For Class 05 (Adult Care), the category must be '21', '22', or '23'.
Class 04 (Transitional Health Svs) requires a "Class Start Date".
The "Annual Review Date" field is blank or invalid. Please review.
errors.Fix: enter date of Annual Review a year or less in the future from date of file being opened

errors.ErrorMessage: The "Start Date" field is required if a "Hardship/Transition Code" is given.
You can only use 'Hardship Code G' if dependent children are involved.
The HE "Override Month" is valid only if the file type is 'HE hardship'.
Hardship code W' (Outstanding Warrant) does not apply to adult care or MSO (Medical Services Only).
MSO (Medical Services Only) "Reason Code" or "Review Dates" is not valid for this class.
Class 08 (Medical Only) cannot include CIHR children (Child in the Home of a Relative – grandfathered scheme).
Categories '15' and '21' cannot include CIHR children (Child in the Home of a Relative – grandfathered scheme).
The file cannot be 'Class 01 No Employment Indicated' without PPMB approval, PWD status, or status O.
The PWD "Next Action Date" must be more than 210 days in the future.
The PWD "Next Action Date" must be in the future.
Exclusion Reason" '11-SPOUSE WITH MED CONDITION' is only valid for a couple or two-parent family.
If you enter an "Exclusion Reason" you must also enter an "End Month".
An "Exclusion Reason" is required to add an "End Month".
The "Exclusion End Date" cannot be more than one year into the future.
Person is over 65 years old and less than 10 years in Canada. "Person Status" must be 'O- OAS/GIS, SPOUSE ALLOWANECE'' or 'B- > 65, < 10 YRS RES'.
Person is over 65, with 10 years or more in Canada. "Person Status" must be 'R- >65, > 10 YRS RES' or 'O- OAS/GIS, SPOUSE ALLOWANECE'.
The "Review Date" field must be blank if the "PPMB (Persons with Persistent Multiple Barriers) code" is blank.
The PWD "Adjudication Date" field is blank, please review.
The PWD "Next Action Date" field is blank, please review.
The bus pass "Expiry Date" must happen after the "Effective Date".
The "Effective Date" and "Expiry Date" fields are required if the "Bus Pass" indicator is set to 'Yes'.
Exclusion Reason" 'XX' is only valid for a single parent.
Exclusion Reason" 'XX' is only valid for a sole recipient.
Exclusion Reason" 'XX' is for a single recipient with CIHR (Child in the Home of a Relative – grandfathered scheme). Check the CIHR count to make sure it is correct.
A PWD designation is required to use "Person Status" 'H-GFA-GAIN FOR HANDICAPPED'.
Person is 6–14 years old. The "Person Status" field must be set to 'N-NOT IN SCHOOL' or 'S-IN SCHOOL'.
The PPMB (Persons with Persistent Multiple Barriers) "Review Date" must be in the future.
The "Province Code" do not align with the "Postal Code".
The "Postal code" field is blank or invalid. Please review.
Street", "City," and "Postal Code" are required to mail computer cheques.
There is a "Shelter Types" conflict.
Mail Cheque to Client?" must be 'Yes' or 'No'.
Mail Cheque to Client?" cannot be selected for 'UI Hardship'.
Mail Cheque to Client?" cannot be selected for 'Hardship Requiring Repayment'.
Mail Cheque to Client?" cannot be selected for 'Limited Hardship'.
The "Line Number" field must be numeric.

Provide a complete address or select the "NFA" button (No Fixed Address) for an open GAIN (GA) file.
The "Postal Code" field is blank or invalid. Please review.
The "Province" field is blank or invalid. Please review.
The "Late Application?" field is required if the "Application Sent to SC?" indicator is selected.
The "Application Not Sent" field is required if the "Application Sent to SC" indicator is set to 'No'.
The "Denial Reason" field is required if the "Success" indicator is set to 'No'.
The "Appeal Date" cannot be in the future.
The "Appeal Date" must be the same as or later than the "Application Sent Date.
The "CCP Appeal" indicator must be 'Yes' if the "CPP Appeal Success" indicator is selected.
The "Lump Sum Amount" cannot be less than zero.
